text: Of the descendants of Benjamin, registered by name and lineage according to their clans and ancestral houses, every male of twenty years or more, everyone fit for military service:
except Caleb, son of Jephunneh. He shall see it, for to him and to his descendants I will give the land he trod upon, because he has fully followed the LORD.
The territory of the Amorites extended from the Akrabbim pass, from Sela and upward.
Benaiah, son of Jehoiada, answered the king: “So be it! May the LORD, the God of my lord the king, so decree!
The descendants of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, and Amalek.
The citadel became an ambush against the sanctuary, and a wicked adversary to Israel at all times.
Nehemiah and his companions called the liquid nephthar, meaning purification, but most people named it naphtha.
Simon and those who were with him pursued him
And behold, Elizabeth, your relative, has also conceived a son in her old age, and this is the sixth month for her who was called barren;
and as he watched Jesus walk by, he said, “Behold, the Lamb of God.”
